description:
Save on travel! Be a self travel agent.

Over 830 students from 78 countries in 2 months enrolled

and the number is counting!

That is fun and easy! Be proud about the journey you made!

This is how to experience the earth!

5 different ready-to-go trips from A to Z with budgeting, booking and road maps.

All you need to do your own trip.

Money back guarantee.

After taking this course you will know how to plan a trip to a country of your choice without travel agency.

You will never use a travel agency from now to book an airplane ticket, rental car and accommodation in any stars hotel or stylish farm house apartment in a hidden countryside hill.

You will get familiar with local historical, traditional, art and gastronomy events. You can use your skill when planing a trip to any country.

You will be prepared to recover quick from the jet lag.

You can budget your trip in a very comfortable format. 5 different ready-to-go trips from A to Z with budgeting, booking and road maps.
title: Save on travel! Be a Self Travel Agent.
